DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study develop , implement , evaluate behavioral weight management intervention communication train component Mexican-American woman . The study three specific aim . Aim 1 : Develop behavioral weight loss intervention modify evidence-based behavioral weight loss treatment use result formative data collect Mexican-American mother-daughter dyad . The adapted intervention focus improve dyadic communication collaboration provide reciprocal support healthy eat physical activity behavior . Aim 2 : Implement evaluate pilot weight management program adapt mother-daughter dyad . Dyads randomly assign partner-based treatment without communication skill train . Aim 3 : Evaluate association change weight , weight-related behavior , psychosocial variable change measure assess interpersonal communication .
DOC.criteria: Female Body mass index 2745 kg/m2 Mexican MexicanAmerican Pregnancy plan become pregnant next year 5 % weight loss last 3 month History bariatric surgery Serious medical condition psychological disorder
